summary.label:
Windy (also known as Windyty) is an extraordinary tool for weather forecast visualization.  This fast, intuitive, detailed, and accurate weather app is trusted by professional pilots, paragliders, skydivers, kiters, surfers, boaters, fishermen, storm chasers, and weather geeks, as well as by governments, army staff and rescue teams.

Whether you are tracking a tropical storm or potential severe weather, planning a trip, pursuing your favorite outdoor sport, or you just need to know if it will rain this weekend, Windy provides you with the most up-to-date weather forecast around.

The uniqueness of Windy lies in the fact that it brings you better quality information than the other weather apps’ pro-features, while our product is absolutely free to use and ad-free as well.

Powerful, smooth, and fluid presentation makes weather forecasting a real pleasure!

ALL FORECAST MODELS SIMULTANEOUSLY

Windy brings you all the world's leading weather forecasting models: global ECMWF and GFS, plus local NEMS, AROME and ICON (for Europe) and NAM (for the USA).

It couldn’t be easier: Just compare all the available models at once and make better decisions!

+40 DIFFERENT WEATHER MAPS

From wind, rain, temperature, humidity, and pressure to swell or CAPE index, with Windy you will have all convenient weather maps right at your fingertips.

SATELLITE & DOPPLER RADAR

Global satellite composite is created from NOAA, EUMETSAT, and Himawari. The image frequency is 5-15 minutes based on area. Doppler radar covers large parts of Europe, America, Asia, and Australia.

MAP LABELS

Windy lets you display observed wind and temperature, forecasted weather, airports around the World, 1500+ paragliding spots or nearby webcams right on the map.

FEATURES AND DATA SOURCES

• All the leading weather forecast models: ECMWF, GFS by NOAA, NEMS, AROME, ICON, and NAM
• Weather radar for many world locations
• 16 altitude levels from the surface to 13.5km/FL450
• Metric or imperial units
• Detailed weather forecast for any location (temperature, rain and snow accumulation, wind speed, wind gusts and wind direction)
• Detailed Airgram and Meteogram
• Meteogram: temperature and dew point, wind speed and wind gusts, pressure, precipitation, altitude cloud cover
• Altitude and Timezone info, Sunrise and Sunset time for any place
• Nearby weather stations – Real-time observed weather such as wind direction, wind speed, and reported temperature
• 50k+ Airports searchable by ICAO and IATA, including runway info, decoded & raw METARs, TAFs and NOTAMs
• Webcams for every location
...and many more

WINDY PREMIUM
Subscribe to Windy Premium and get the most detailed forecast.

• Better forecast: Detailed 1-hour data
• Faster service: Served from 44 locations
• Full privacy: No ads or tracking

We reinvented the wheel, but it was kinda squarish, and our is round with a shiny disk. 

Apple agrees — “Apps we Love”

And people are into Weather Fit too — “the app is so lovely, with so many features, and has shown such amazing development over the years” 

What do we do differently? 

We don’t forget about the main idea behind weather apps. Weather Fit doesn’t just tell people the weather but answers the oh-so difficult question, ‘what to wear?’ And, the app does it in an engaging and fun way. 

Creatively informative. 
It has a cute little character, who has the sense of style. The character dresses according to the weather. In such a way the app shows you what to wear now, today, tonight, and tomorrow. Also, if it’s sunny, the character will put on sunglasses; if it’s rainy — will take an umbrella; if the air isn’t clean enough — an anti-pollution mask. 

Uniquely personalized experience.
What’s even better is that the avatar is customizable. You can choose its sex, skin tone, haircut, color of hair and eyebrows, glasses, beard and its color. Make it look like yourself or a person you would like to see every day.

Imaginative and diverse.
There is a nice landscape behind the character, and it is used to display the current or future weather. The landscape changes according to weather conditions, time of day, and season. It’s both a weather forecast and art — beautiful and precise.   

Forecast that you can trust.
We use a reliable weather source, which implements a scientific approach to predicting weather and not a random numbers generator :)  

Intuitive and slick user experience.
The interface is simple and straight to the point: hourly forecast, current conditions, and daily forecast at a glance. All you need to know is on the screen. 

A bunch of neat additional stuff:

Even more customization.

Our love and gratitude. 
You help us grow, and it’s difficult to describe how much we appreciate it.

The motivation of co-developing Raining Bell aims at engaging cross-cutting synergies of public-private partnership on applying real-time radar monitoring technique for altering rains or thunderstorms to come. The APP takes advantage of mobile devices to display easy-to-understand graphic animation converted from professional information. By using signals received by GPS chip in any mobile device, Raining Bell will provide location-based animated information and instant alters according to intensities of near-by radar echoes.
This APP is under evolution for better performance. Through methodologies of data assimilation technique and radar reflectivity extrapolation, it integrates most observations of radar stations in  Taiwan and FORMOSAT-7 Radio Occultation. Users can check the real-time radar echo in graphic mode and receive alters of probability of rains in coming hour.
The radar reflectivity extrapolation method is developed by Prof. Kao-Shen Chung in the Dept. of Atmospheric Sciences of the National Central University (NCU). The key collaborators include Prof. Pay-Liam Lin in the Dept. of Atmospheric Sciences of NCU and Prof. Jong-Dao Jou in the Dept. of Atmospheric Sciences of the National Taiwan University. The integrated information platform is developed and operated by the National Science and Technology Center for Disaster Reduction. The graphic engine is coded by ThinkYes Technology Co., Ltd..

這個服務主要取得「行政院環境保護署」所提供的「空氣品質指數」 (Air Quality Index, AQI)，AQI分級計算參考污染物為SO2、NO2、PM10、PM2.5、O3、CO等六項，每小時發布一次。其數值越大、級別和類別越高、表徵顏色越深，說明空氣污染狀況越嚴重，對人體的健康危害也就越大。我們的服務即定時監測各站數的數值，當空氣由良好普通等級進入輕度污染(甚至更嚴重的等級)時，即推播通知您。也可設定相反情形下，即空氣變好時，推播通知您。

《《《 동별로 확인하는 정확한 날씨와 미세먼지 정보 》》》

국내 최대 날씨와 공기 정보서비스 제공 기업 케이웨더의 날씨 어플리케이션 “케이웨더 날씨”가 동별로 정확한 날씨와 미세먼지 정보를 실시간으로 알려드립니다. 

“케이웨더 날씨”는 동별 날씨와 미세먼지의 실시간 정보 제공을 위해 구별로 제공되는 국가관측망 정보에 2,000여개의 민간관측망 데이터를 지역별 오염배출정보, 인구밀도, 지형 및 토지피복 등 빅데이터를 인공지능으로 조합하여 실시간으로 보정된 자료를 제공합니다.

이제부터 동별로 다른 날씨와 미세먼지 정보를 실시간으로 확인하세요!!!

[우리동네 날씨 정보]
■ 더욱 상세한 날씨정보(개황, 일출/일몰시간, 일별/시간별 바람, 강수 정보 등) 제공
■ 해외 주요 도시 날씨 정보 제공
■ 날씨 방송, 날씨 속보, 기상관련 뉴스 정보 제공
■ 기상특보, 황사정보, 태풍정보 제공

[우리동네 미세먼지 정보]
■ 국가측정망과 민간측정망 데이터를 융합하여 생산하는 ‘내가 숨 쉬는 공기’ 
■ 동 별로 제각기 다른 미세먼지 실황 정보
■ 10분 단위로 업데이트 되는 실시간 미세먼지 정보
■ 전문 예보관의 미세먼지 예보 (5일, 3시간 단위)

[편의기능]
■ 케이웨더/기상청 예보 비교 선택 가능(환경설정에서 선택)
■ 지역 동별(동, 읍) 선택 및 추가/삭제 가능

[위젯]
■ 시간별 위젯
■ 나절별 위젯
■ 일별 위젯
■ 미세먼지 위젯

[접근 권한 안내]
■ 위치정보   - 케이웨더 날씨 앱 내에서 현 위치 검색에 사용됩니다. 서버에 별도로 저장하지는 않으며 현 위치 검색을 할 때에만 확인 합니다.

* 선택 접근 권한은 동의하지 않아도 해당 기능 외의 서비스를 이용할 수 있습니다.
* 선택 접근 권한 미동의시 서비스 일부 기능의 정상적인 이용이 어려울 수 있습니다.


[자주 묻는 질문]
■ 현재 밖에 비오는데 현재 날씨는 맑음으로 되어있어요.  
- 현재 날씨는 기상청 관측소 값을 토대로 표출하는 것으로 1시간마다 갱신됩니다. 따라서 갱신주기에 따라 늦게 반영될 수 있습니다.
■ 예보가 맞지 않아요.   - 예보는 예상하는 확률로써 100% 확실하지 않으며, 이상기후로 인한 기상이변이 심해짐에 따라 적중률 높은 예보를 내는 것이 더욱 어려워지고 있습니다. 기상변화가 심할 경우 케이웨더, 기상청 예보를 번갈아 보시면서 날씨 변화에 대비하시기 바랍니다.
■ 정보가 업데이트되지 않아요.
- 트래픽이 몰리는 출근시간 및 매시 정각에는 업데이트가 간헐적으로 지연될 수 있습니다. 이럴 경우 새로고침 버튼을 눌러 보시거나 1~2분뒤에 앱 재실행 부탁 드립니다.
■ 위젯이 현위치를 잡지 않아요.(-> 추후 업데이트를 통하여 자동으로 현위치를 잡을 수 있도록 변경예정입니다.)
- 오른쪽 상단의 새로고침 버튼을 눌러주세요.
■ 업데이트 후 홈 위젯이 보이지 않아요.
- 아이폰을 재시작 해주세요.

summary.label:
If you use this app, you can easily obtain "Temperature-humidity index(Discomfort Index)", "WBGT(Heat stroke index)", "Dew point temperature", etc., from weather information.
Furthermore, the app calculates the air condition from dry-bulb temperature(Td) and wet-bulb temperature(Tw) obtained by Assmann-Psychrometer, etc., and the app can also input atmospheric pressure.
The app can calculate 11 items and 13 indicators, and conversion to the Celsius temperature and SI units (or in the Fahrenheit temperature and Imperial and US customary measurement systems) also you can simply by switching of "Temperature Unit".
The items and indicators that this app can calculate are as follows.

- Dew Point Temperature
- Relative Humidity
- Humidity Ratio(Absolute Humidity)
    Weight absolute humidity
    Weight absolute humidity in the more smaller unit.
    Volume absolute humidity
- Humidity Deficit
- Enthalpy
- Specific Volume
- Equilibrium Vapor Pressure 
- Partial Pressure
- Boiling Point of Water
- WBGT(Estimated value)
- Discomfort Index[Temperature-humidity index] 

(( Supplementary explanation about the WBGT(Estimated value) and the Discomfort index.

The calculation formula of the outdoor WBGT is "WBGT = 0.7 Tnw + 0.1 Td + 0.2 Tg", but since there is no entry a item Globe thermometer temperature(Tg) in the app, so estimation the Globe thermometer temperature(Tg) by Dry-bulb temperature(Td).
- Calculation formula : "Tg = 1.45 Td - 27.162 [Temperature unit: ℉]”
There is a very strong correlation between Globe thermometer temperature(Tg) and Dry-bulb temperature(Td).
[Statistical information on this correlation : The number of samples is 17376 and the coefficient of determination(R^2) when statistics are taken is 0.919]

For natural wet-bulb temperature(Tnw), convert the Wet-bulb temperature(Tw) obtained by measurement by the Assmann Psychrometer to the Wet-bulb temperature(Tw) measured in natural state, a use it as Natural wet-bulb temperature(Tnw).
The natural state here means that the wind speed at the time of measurement is 5 meters per second(16.4 feet per second) or less.
The algorithm of this conversion is very special, so we omit the explanation.

"Discomfort Index" is "Temperature-humidity index".
The calculation formula is "Discomfort Index[DI] = 0.4 × (Td + Tw) +15 [Temperature unit: ℉]".  ))

If you want to get the current atmospheric pressure, the current dry-bulb temperature(Td) and the current wet-bulb temperature(Tw), tap the "Weather" information button. By the way, In iPhone6, etc., you can get the atmospheric pressure by pressing "MEAS" button.
You can choose conditions of the wet bulb is you can choose any one of the “Normal" or “Froze” (※ If you choose the “Froze”, setting is enabled in when if sub-zero in wet-bulb temperature(Tw) ).
Even if you enter the measurement value such as a non-draft type  psychrometer(for example, "Augusto Psychrometer", etc.), just tap the button and the corresponding value can be displayed (※ the app is subject to use of a ventilation type psychrometer in terms of measurement accuracy).
The app can receive the calculated value of dry bulb temperature (Td) and wet bulb temperature (Tw) from the sister app “Calculator of Air”.
If you use this function, you can input "dew point temperature", "relative humidity", etc. (※ there is a need to start up the "Calculator of Air" first).
Input range is the temperature is -30 ℃ to 50 ℃ (-22 ° F to 122 ° F), the atmospheric pressure is 600 hPa to 2475 hPa(17.72 inHg to 73.09 inHg).

This app is using the OpenWeatherMap(CC BY-SA4.0).


- Disclaimer 1.
Please input and use the temperature range(0 ℃ to 40 ℃ / 32°F to 104°F ) according to common sense as much as possible. If you enter an extreme value correct calculation result may not appear.

- Disclaimer 2.

      Fish activities are related to many weather conditions. The influence of water temperature and atmospheric pressure is most obvious, but the influence of temperature on water temperature is lagging behind and slow, and the change of atmospheric pressure is more intuitive. The higher atmospheric pressure, the higher dissolved oxygen in water, the more active fish activities. Wind speed and direction are also an important factor. The breeze blowing Buddha water surface increases the dissolved oxygen of water. Cold blowing south wind and hot blowing north wind are very beneficial for fishing. Finally, rainfall and humidity also have a certain impact on fishing.
          According to some research, fish activities are most active in about one hour before and after the moontransit (upper or lower), and are also active within half an hour before and after the Moonrise or Moonset.
